passages.text:
The door behind you suddenly slams shut.  You can hear the lock cylinders sliding into place.

[[p:Try to open the door.]]
[[p:(Action) Kick the door.]]
passages.name: door slam

passages.text:
Muffled Voice::That's not going to work.

Muffled Voice::You aren't leaving this room until I say so.

Jasper,thinking::Oh no...

[[p:(Action) Look through the viewport.]]
passages.name: p:Try to open the door.

passages.text:
Muffled Voice::That's really the only trick you know, isn't it?

Muffled Voice::Beat it until it opens, or gives you what you want.

Muffled Voice::I guess that's all you were ever taught.

Jasper,thinking::Oh no...

[[p:(Action) Look through the viewport.]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Kick the door.

passages.text:
TAG

[[C->viewport continue]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Look through the viewport.

passages.text:
Jasper,sad::I already knew it was her...

Julia::Look at you, running around, acting like you own the place.

Julia::You're exhibiting clear and willful non-compliance.  I'll remember that when you enter my care.

[[How did you even know I was here?]]
[[p:I'll find a way out of here.  Just like last time.]]
[[p:Let me out of here!  You bitch!]]
[[p:(Action) Kick the door again.]]

links.name: How did you even know I was here?
links.link: How did you even know I was here?

links.name: p:I'll find a way out of here.  Just like last time.
links.link: p:I'll find a way out of here.  Just like last time.

links.name: p:Let me out of here!  You bitch!
links.link: p:Let me out of here!  You bitch!

passages.name: viewport continue

passages.text:
Julia::Do you really think I couldn't hear you?  You aren't subtle.

Jasper,sad::...

Julia::I just needed to wait for you leave, and hang back until you thought you entered one of these rooms without thinking.

Julia::That's the mistake people like you always make.  You think you're safe.  You let your guard down.

Julia::Not me.  Not anymore.

[[C->viewport continue]]
passages.name: How did you even know I was here?

passages.text:
Julia::I don't like your tone, miss.

Julia::In fact...

[[C->Julia slaps button]]
passages.name: p:Let me out of here!  You bitch!

passages.text:
Julia::Miss, that's an extremely childish way to behave.

Julia::In fact, you know what...

[[C->Julia slaps button]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Kick the door again.

passages.text:
Julia::You better hurry if that's the plan.

[[C->Julia slaps button]]
passages.name: p:I'll find a way out of here.  Just like last time.

passages.text:
Through the door, you hear the muffled sound of a switch being thrown.

Not long after, you can sense a gentle hiss vibrating the air.

Julia::Hear that?  It's the sound of BZ gas filling the room.

Julia::It'll take a few minutes, but before long, the concentration will be high enough that I don't think I'll have any trouble getting you into a restrainment jacket.

[[You can just press some buttons outside these rooms and have them filled with BZ gas?  I don't believe you!]]
[[p:That's cheating!  You should come in here and try and restrain me, one on one!]]
[[p:Do you have any idea how fried my brain nugget is?  Your dumb gas isn't gonna have any effect whatsoever.]]

links.name: You can just press some buttons outside these rooms and have them filled with BZ gas?  I don't believe you!
links.link: You can just press some buttons outside these rooms and have them filled with BZ gas?  I don't believe you!

links.name: p:That's cheating!  You should come in here and try and restrain me, one on one!
links.link: p:That's cheating!  You should come in here and try and restrain me, one on one!

links.name: p:Do you have any idea how fried my brain nugget is?  Your dumb gas isn't gonna have any effect whatsoever.
links.link: p:Do you have any idea how fried my brain nugget is?  Your dumb gas isn't gonna have any effect whatsoever.

passages.name: Julia slaps button

passages.text:
Julia::They're outfitted with this mechanism in the event that we need to subdue and restrain a patient before moving them.

Julia::This method is exclusively reserved for violent patients, such as yourself.

[[C->Julia slaps button]]
passages.name: You can just press some buttons outside these rooms and have them filled with BZ gas?  I don't believe you!

passages.text:
Julia::I tried that, Miss.

Julia::I could have just gassed you in that surgical room earlier.  But, instead, I tried to be nice.

Julia::It didn't end well for me.  I'm not repeating that mistake.

[[p:What was going on with that fern lump you were visiting earlier, huh?  Why are you down here?]]
[[p:Why won't you just leave me alone?  I don't have anything to do with you!]]

links.name: p:What was going on with that fern lump you were visiting earlier, huh?  Why are you down here?
links.link: p:What was going on with that fern lump you were visiting earlier, huh?  Why are you down here?

links.name: p:Why won't you just leave me alone?  I don't have anything to do with you!
links.link: p:Why won't you just leave me alone?  I don't have anything to do with you!

passages.name: p:That's cheating!  You should come in here and try and restrain me, one on one!

passages.text:
Julia::Please.  By the time I get back with a gas mask, you'll be frozen and helpless.

Julia::Ever hear about those tourists who get tetrodotoxin poisoning from octopuses?  They end up flat on their back, unable to fight anything.

Julia::They can't even close their eyes.  The sun burns holes in their corneas.

Julia::Luckily for you the lights here are dim.

[[p:What was going on with that fern lump you were visiting earlier, huh?  Why are you down here?]]
[[p:Why won't you just leave me alone?  I don't have anything to do with you!]]

links.name: p:What was going on with that fern lump you were visiting earlier, huh?  Why are you down here?
links.link: p:What was going on with that fern lump you were visiting earlier, huh?  Why are you down here?

links.name: p:Why won't you just leave me alone?  I don't have anything to do with you!
links.link: p:Why won't you just leave me alone?  I don't have anything to do with you!

passages.name: p:Do you have any idea how fried my brain nugget is?  Your dumb gas isn't gonna have any effect whatsoever.

passages.text:
Julia seems a little rattled by your retort.

Julia::I know who you are, Miss.  I know what kind of blood you have in you.

Julia::...

[[C->Julia leaves]]
passages.name: p:What was going on with that fern lump you were visiting earlier, huh?  Why are you down here?

passages.text:
Julia seems a little rattled by your retort.

Julia::I know who you are, Miss.  I can't just leave you alone.

Julia::I know what kind of blood you have in you, and on you.

Julia::...

[[C->Julia leaves]]
passages.name: p:Why won't you just leave me alone?  I don't have anything to do with you!

passages.text:
Julia::I'll be back in a few minutes with a gas mask.  I recommend lying down, it'll make the transition feel a little smoother.

[[C->Julia disappears]]
passages.name: Julia leaves

passages.text:
Julia glides down the hall, escaping your field of view.

[[p:Fucking bitch!]]
[[p:(Action) Kick the door, again.]]
passages.name: Julia disappears

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::Cool it.  We need to focus on finding a way out of here before the concentration of BZ gas gets too high.  

[[C->don't know time]]
passages.name: p:Fucking bitch!

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::Cool it.  We need to focus on finding a way out of here before the concentration of BZ gas gets too high.  

[[C->don't know time]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Kick the door, again.

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::I tell you what to do because I'm protecting you.  You listen because deep down you know you need it.

[[C->don't know time]]
passages.name: Why do you always tell me what to do?  Why do I always listen?
p:(Action) Manically search the room for an exit.

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::I don't know how much time we have.

[[Why do you always tell me what to do?  Why do I always listen?]]
[[p:(Action) Manically search the room for an exit.]]

links.name: Why do you always tell me what to do?  Why do I always listen?
links.link: Why do you always tell me what to do?  Why do I always listen?

links.name: p:(Action) Manically search the room for an exit.
links.link: p:(Action) Manically search the room for an exit.

passages.name: don't know time

passages.text:
You do a quick scan of the room.

The jagged outline of a person rests beneath another rancid pile of soiled blankets.  Portions of an ivory neckline protrude from the sheets.

[[C->door slam]]
passages.name: Untitled Passage 1
